title: Making a Clash Team.
body: Making a Clash team, Please be mindful and considerate, Here to have fun but also win if we can. Please have a working mic for discord. I am a Main top/adc. Lets get this team going. thanks.

replies.body: Hey bro you need a midlaner silver 1/low gold.
You got a support? Add me on league: Dankbanana24
